channel.title: [PI] Updated client + extra's
channel.description:
i don't really contribute to the client section, so here's a contribution.
includes:
[ul][li]508 gameframe[/li] [li]Orbs working[/li] [li]Turmoil and soulsplit (you'll need to make it work server sided, but it's all there client sided)[/li] [li]Semi-cleaned cache[/li] [li]Some updated interfaces[/li] [li]New loading context's[/li] [li]Pvp armours, rocktails, claws, chaotics etc (all hardcoded, no model header) [/li][/ul]
bugs:
some of these bugs are hardly noticeable, you'll just have to look into it.
[ul][li]No logout button[/li] [li]I've had to disable the overlay method, as it caused a thread 4 when interfaces such as the multi icon were used[/li] [li]When the equipment screen is on, and a player runs when a new region is loading, you'll get a thread 4[/li] [li]Trade, duel and report abuse button clicks are all positioned horribly (the hovering and clicking)[/li][/ul]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2mfnfav.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/rvj420.png[/img]
because i'm the laziest person ever, the old cache will load. So you'll have to download some of the sprites and add it to the cache (when it auto-downloads);
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/16875849/Docs.rar]Download the extra sprites needed for the gameframe to work here.[/url]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?d52oagg2sanynum]Download the client here.[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/3atfzbw9rcn0/Asterix_client.rar]Uppit mirror - thanks to Daginith[/url]
if you need any mirrors, i will gladly add some. Other then that, enjoy ;).
[i]pro tip: thread 4 caused by drawgamescreen and draw3d methods.[/i]

item.title: [PI] Updated client + extra's
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

i don’t really contribute to the client section, so here’s a contribution.

includes:

[ul][li]508 gameframe[/li]
[li]Orbs working[/li]
[li]Turmoil and soulsplit (you’ll need to make it work server sided, but it’s all there client sided)[/li]
[li]Semi-cleaned cache[/li]
[li]Some updated interfaces[/li]
[li]New loading context’s[/li]
[li]Pvp armours, rocktails, claws, chaotics etc (all hardcoded, no model header) [/li][/ul]

bugs:

some of these bugs are hardly noticeable, you’ll just have to look into it.

[ul][li]No logout button[/li]
[li]I’ve had to disable the overlay method, as it caused a thread 4 when interfaces such as the multi icon were used[/li]
[li]When the equipment screen is on, and a player runs when a new region is loading, you’ll get a thread 4[/li]
[li]Trade, duel and report abuse button clicks are all positioned horribly (the hovering and clicking)[/li][/ul]

2mfnfav.png755×495

rvj420.png762×494

because i’m the laziest person ever, the old cache will load. So you’ll have to download some of the sprites and add it to the cache (when it auto-downloads);

Download the extra sprites needed for the gameframe to work here.

Download the client here.
Uppit mirror - thanks to Daginith

if you need any mirrors, i will gladly add some. Other then that, enjoy ;).

pro tip: thread 4 caused by drawgamescreen and draw3d methods.
